column2: Everyone Deserves the Right to Breathe Smoke-free Air
column5: There is no such thing as safe levels of secondhand smoke – it contains more than 70 cancer-causing chemicals and is a danger to us all.  South Bend’s Common Council recently chose to delay voting on a measure that would protect workers and families from the dangers of secondhand smoke,Council Vice President"
column9: There is no such thing as safe levels of secondhand smoke,31,//d22r54gnmuhwmk.cloudfront.net/photos/0/it/ne/XziTNezUVsTBcmd-556x313-cropped.jpg"
